00035 #include "EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric.hpp"

00047 
00048 EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric( double low_a, double high_a )
00049   : AveragingQM(SUM),
00050     highVal(high_a),
00051     lowVal(low_a)
00052 {
00053   if (lowVal > highVal)
00054     std::swap( lowVal, highVal );
00055 }
00056 
00057 EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::~EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric()
00058 {}
00059 
00060 std::string EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::get_name() const
00061   { return "Edge Length Range Metric"; }
00062   
00063 int EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00064   { return 1; }
00065 
00072 bool EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::evaluate_common(PatchData &pd, 
00073                                              size_t this_vert,
00074                                              double &fval, 
00075                                              std::vector<size_t>& adj_verts,
00076                                              MsqError &err)
00077 {
00078   fval=0.0;
00079   Vector3D edg;
00080   pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices(this_vert,adj_verts,err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00081   int num_sample_points=adj_verts.size();
00082   double *metric_values=new double[num_sample_points];
00083   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00084     //store the length of the edge, and the first and second component of
00085     //metric values, respectively.
00086   double temp_length=0.0;
00087   double temp_first=0.0;
00088   double temp_second=0.0;
00089     //PRINT_INFO("INSIDE ELR, vertex = %f,%f,%f\n",verts[this_vert][0],verts[this_vert][1],verts[this_vert][2]);
00090     //loop while there are still more adjacent vertices.
00091   for (unsigned i = 0; i < adj_verts.size(); ++i) 
00092   {
00093     edg = verts[this_vert] - verts[adj_verts[i]];
00094       //compute the edge length
00095     temp_length=edg.length();
00096       //get the first component
00097     temp_first = temp_length - lowVal;
00098     temp_first = fabs(temp_first) - (temp_first);
00099     temp_first*=temp_first;
00100       //get the second component
00101     temp_second = highVal - temp_length;
00102     temp_second = fabs(temp_second) - (temp_second);
00103     temp_second*=temp_second;
00104       //combine the two components
00105     metric_values[i]=temp_first+temp_second;
00106   }
00107     //average the metric values of the edges
00108   fval=average_metrics(metric_values,num_sample_points,err);
00109     //clean up
00110   delete[] metric_values;
00111     //always return true because mesh is always valid wrt this metric.
00112   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00113   
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 bool EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd, 
00118                                         size_t vertex, 
00119                                         double& value, 
00120                                         MsqError& err )
00121 {
00122   std::vector<size_t> verts;
00123   bool rval = evaluate_common( pd, vertex, value, verts, err );
00124   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00125 }
00126 
00127 bool EdgeLengthRangeQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00128                                                      size_t vertex,
00129                                                      double& value,
00130                                                      std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00131                                                      MsqError& err )
00132 {
00133   indices.clear();
00134   bool rval = evaluate_common( pd, vertex, value, indices, err );
00135   
00136   std::vector<size_t>::iterator r, w;
00137   for (r = w = indices.begin(); r != indices.end(); ++r) {
00138     if (*r < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00139       *w = *r;
00140       ++w;
00141     }
00142   }
00143   indices.erase( w, indices.end() );
00144   if (vertex < pd.num_free_vertices())
00145     indices.push_back( vertex );
00146   
00147   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00148 }
